description: This file defines a layout component for the notes section in a Remix-based frontend application. It includes loader functions to fetch notes, and React components to manage the layout, sidebar, header, and note creation functionality.

methods.name: NotesLayout
methods.description: Main React component that manages the state and layout for notes, including sidebar toggle, loading notes, and creating new notes.

methods.name: handleNewNote
methods.description: Asynchronous function triggered to create a new empty note, refresh data, navigate to the note's editing page, and close the sidebar.
